message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to you is $10000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be comfortable with the price.
